title: Vinny Russo, J and Nicole Ryan (Crew-ish Show!)
description:
Vinny Russo gives us a tour at his new job, We Are Curated, a dealership that specializes in the sale and restoration of exotic cars. Not just the new hotness, but vintage metal, too. Diablos, Countaches, XJ220s, classic Benzes and more. 


And while Zack is out of town for his other job, J Ryan stands in on the mixer and brought his wife and Late Night Play Set co-host, Nicole. It's a crew show! 

https://wearecurated.com

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @vinnyrusso1 @porschelife111 @latenightplayset 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @vinnyrusso1 @porschelife111 @latenightplayset 

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/7mnIxSoSZY0
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
